body.name: WYZE Video Doorbell with Chime (Horizontal Wedge Included), 1080p HD Video, 3:4 Aspect Ratio: 3:4 Head-to-Toe View, 2-Way Audio, Night Vision, Hardwired, Works with Alexa & Google Assistant

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Wyze Video Doorbell with Chime Bundle

features: input voltage：100 -240V.Power: 16V-24V AC, ≥10VA (May use existing doorbell-chime circuit, or standalone transformer and wires.)

Instant Notifications: Never miss another visitor. Unless you want to. Receive instant push notifications when Wyze Video Doorbell is pressed so you know the moment someone’s at your door. Pull up a live stream of your visitor before responding to decide whether you’d like to ignore a solicitor or answer the delivery driver.

3:4 Aspect Ratio: 3:4 head-to-toe view & 1080p Full HD Video: People are taller than they are wide. So is our live stream. Wyze Video Doorbell records and live streams video in 1080p Full HD with a 3:4 aspect ratio so you can see every visitor from head to toe. You’ll also be able to see packages left on the ground beneath your doorbell.

Motion Detection, Smart Alerts & Video Recording: Wyze Video Doorbell lights up brightly when motion is detected nearby, alerting visitors and would-be porch pirates of your video doorbell. Plus, you can turn on push notifications to get a phone alert whenever anyone or anything approaches your door, even if they don't ring the doorbell.

Built to endure the elements: IP65 weather-resistant. Install Wyze Video Doorbell on your door without worrying about interference from the elements. IP65 weather resistance protects this doorbell from rain, snow, and sun.

Chime Included: Hear your doorbell ring, chirp, or bark from any room. Pair any number of Wyze Chimes with your doorbell so every room in your house is ready to alert you when someone’s at the door. One chime is included with each Wyze Video Doorbell.
Connectivity: Direct to WiFi 802.11 b/g/n, 2.4GHz (5GHz WiFi not supported)
body.description: Your front door is an incredibly magical place. It’s where opportunity knocks and excitement arrives in cardboard boxes. It welcomes friendly faces and new acquaintances. And it’s a mighty protector against all that’s unwelcome. That’s why we built you a device that allows you to be at your front door no matter where you are. That’s why we packed advanced camera hardware and smart features into a mighty small frame. That’s why we lab tested it under extreme conditions so it always performs when you need it to. We engineered a video doorbell so magical, it makes you the magician. Infrared LEDs illuminates up to 29.6 ft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WYZE Video Doorbell Review
reviews.reviewText: The WYZE Video Doorbell with Chime, complete with a horizontal wedge for installation flexibility and offering 1080p HD video quality, is a game-changer in home security and convenience.One of the standout features of this video doorbell is its crystal-clear 1080p HD video quality. Whether it's day or night, rain or shine, this device delivers sharp and detailed footage. This level of clarity ensures you can easily identify visitors, packages, or potential security concerns. The wide-angle lens captures a broad field of view, eliminating blind spots and enhancing your overall safety.The inclusion of a horizontal wedge for installation is a thoughtful addition. It allows users to customize the angle at which the doorbell is mounted, ensuring a perfect view of their entryway. This flexibility is especially handy for homes with unconventional door setups. Additionally, the bundled chime ensures you never miss a visitor, even if you're not near your phone.Another significant advantage of the WYZE Video Doorbell is its seamless integration with the WYZE app and ecosystem. You can monitor your front door from anywhere using your smartphone, receive instant alerts, and even communicate with visitors through two-way audio. The device is easy to install and configure, making it accessible for users of all tech levels.In conclusion, the WYZE Video Doorbell with Chime, boasting 1080p HD video quality, a horizontal wedge for adaptable installation, and user-friendly features, is a fantastic addition to any home. It enhances security, convenience, and peace of mind, making it a valuable investment for homeowners looking to modernize their entryway monitoring.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High value, has the features I want and looks great, too
reviews.reviewText: For a doorbell camera I tried the Google Nest doorbell Ring v2, Blink, and the Wyze model. Of all but the Wyze camera the motion detection was just awful. With both the Ring and Blink, something as small as the wind hitting my hedges in the distance (in an area I indicated as irrelevant) would set off the alarm and yet someone could pretty much walk right up and rip my door off and nothing. The Wyze doorbell selective motion detection actually works very well. The notifications are a bit delayed, but I’m ok with that.What I also like about the Wyze is that the button is constantly lit blue, and the device itself was the smallest of all the ones I tested. Google was comically large, followed by ring and then blink.The field of view was best with Blink, I’d say, followed by Ring and then Google. I found Wyze to have the worst field of view, but in my application this was acceptible (I only need the camera for the door, not to monitor other areas of my property as I have separate cameras for that).When cost is favored in, Wyze came out as a clear winner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I Had An Issue Initially, But After The Fix, It's Been Perfect!
reviews.reviewText: The installation of this was a breeze! Basically, remove your old doorbell, wire this doorbell to your original doorbell wiring, wire a fuse to your doorbell chime connections inside the house, done!Obviously, follow the actual steps that Wyze has for installation, but installing this was definitely simple if you're installing this where you're current doorbell is located. In the Wyze app, when you select "add new device", you can select this doorbell for setup, and it will then guide you through the entire setup process for installing, and also for connecting the doorbell to the app.Once I installed the doorbell, and set it up with the app, it worked great for the first 24 hours or so until going offline. Pressing the doorbell manually didn't work either. Resetting the wi-fi didn't fix the doorbell, but resetting power to the device (flipping the breaker for the doorbell power) DID work! After a few days of flipping the breaker whenever it went offline, I found a fix for this issue. Using a toggle switch in-line with the fuse at the doorbell chime (inside the house), I was able to toggle the device off/on without having to reset the breaker to the doorbell. After using this toggle switch to reset the device a few nights in a row (after it would go offline), it stopped having this issue entirely. I probably could have contacted their support and figured out a different fix for the issue, but this worked for me.After fixing the issue I mentioned above, this doorbell has been working great! I really enjoy the video quality, and the Wyze app is smooth, and easy to use. The doorbell chime is loud, and has different sound options, which I think is a nice feature as well!Overall, for the price compared to other video doorbell systems, this Wyze doorbell seems to be a great buy! I'd definitely recommend this to anyone looking to stay under the price of some of the other competitors out there.

I recently purchased the Wyze Video Doorbell with Chime from Amazon, and I must say I'm quite satisfied with its performance. Despite its smaller size, this doorbell manages to pack a punch and gets the job done effectively.The installation process was relatively straightforward, although I did encounter a minor setback due to not having the right drilling bit for my brick exterior. However, once that hurdle was overcome, setting up the doorbell was a breeze. It took me approximately an hour, but I believe it would be quicker for someone with the proper tools.One of the standout features of the Wyze Video Doorbell is its impressive video quality. Whether it's day or night, the camera captures clear and sharp footage, allowing me to see and identify visitors clearly. Even in low-light conditions, the night vision mode performs exceptionally well.While I find the Wyze Video Doorbell to be a fantastic addition to my home security setup, I do have one concern. Given its compact size, I worry about the potential for theft or tampering. It would be great if Wyze could incorporate additional security features to address this concern.Overall, I highly recommend the Wyze Video Doorbell with Chime to others in need of a reliable video doorbell solution. Its compact design, excellent video quality, and easy installation make it a worthwhile investment for enhancing home security.I hope this review captures your thoughts accurately. Let me know if you have any further input or if you'd like me to make any adjustments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 11, 2021
reviews.reviewText: The Wyze doorbell does not come with a power supply/transformer so this has to be purchased separately. Installation and setup is quite easy and straight forward. The Chime unit is manufactured for the American market and therefore requires a converter socket to connect to a UK outlet, it comes with a good variety of tunes and with maximum volume selected it is very loud. The main NEGATIVE with this doorbell is that IT DOES NOT WORK WITH ALEXA IN THE UK!! It does work with Alexa in the USA and a request has been posted (approx 3 years ago now) on the Wyze Forum to apply the same upgrade for the UK but at this point in time this request has not been fulfilled. So in the UK Alexa will not tell you that someone is at the door nor will you be able to see who it is on your Alexa Show units. It is for this reason that I have given it a three star rating.
Just like all of Wyze’ products, this one is exceptional value and fantastic quality. I only wish you could install multiple "bell" speakers around the home.

I bought Wyze because you can save data on a cloud (not the camera) and you don’t need to pay for the service. It was also one of the cheapest. And it works great! The camera is really clear, I can talk to the person at the door and it was very easy to install. Hardwired, so no battery to change.Just one thing, there is a slight delay on my phone after the doorbell rings (maybe 2 seconds). It doesn’t offer the feature where it notifies you before the person reaches your door.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Really?? Comes with a US plug in the UK. That is a pretty poor start :-(Returned as it wasn't clear from the advert that this is a wired doorbell. Pretty disappointing experience all round
